character.name: Lulu豬
character.description: ToyzeroPlus 旗下角色 IP，粉紅色小豬造型

midjourney.character_description: 可愛粉紅色小豬 Lulu，ToyzeroPlus 品牌吉祥物

2D Animation.suffix: , 2D animation style, cartoon aesthetic, vibrant colors, animation-ready, cel-shaded

3D Animation.suffix: , 3D animation style, Pixar-quality render, soft lighting, character rig-ready, high-poly model

Comic.suffix: , comic book style, manga aesthetic, bold outlines, halftone effects, panel layout-ready

Single Visual.suffix: , single visual illustration, poster design, hero shot, high-resolution artwork, print-ready

Sticker.suffix: , sticker design, LINE/Telegram style, transparent background, die-cut ready, expressive pose

Product.template: , {product_type} product design, merchandise-ready, 3D product render, commercial quality, realistic materials
Product.input_prompt: 請輸入產品類型（例如：plush toy 玩具公仔, T-shirt T恤, mug 馬克杯, keychain 鑰匙扣）

Collaboration.template: , collaboration design with {brand_name}, crossover style, brand integration, co-branding elements, limited edition aesthetic
Collaboration.input_prompt: 請輸入聯乘品牌/IP（例如：Sanrio, Disney, LINE Friends）

LuLu World.template: , LuLu World theme park scene, {scene_description}, immersive environment, theme park aesthetic, family-friendly atmosphere
LuLu World.input_prompt: 請輸入場景描述（例如：entrance gate 入口大閘, candy land 糖果樂園, water ride 水上設施）

PR/Seeding.template: , PR campaign visual, {campaign_focus}, social media optimized, influencer-friendly, shareable content, brand storytelling
PR/Seeding.input_prompt: 請輸入公關重點（例如：new product launch 新品發布, charity event 慈善活動, brand awareness 品牌宣傳）
examples: new product launch 新品發布

Campaign.template: , marketing campaign design, {campaign_theme}, promotional material, call-to-action visual, campaign identity, multi-platform ready
Campaign.input_prompt: 請輸入活動主題（例如：summer sale 夏日優惠, back to school 開學季, anniversary celebration 週年慶）
examples: limited edition drop 限量發售
